short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sets your New Tab page to a beautiful and simple search page with no ads or trackers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sets your New Tab page to a beautiful and simple search page with no ads or trackers. Defaults to DuckDuckGo search but hit tab for Google search. Both search forms have realtime query suggestions.

The images are Reddit's top images for the month and a new list is collected daily. Click in the bottom right corner for more info on the current image.
